title: Platform Maintenance Scheduled
message: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on February 25th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM UTC. During this time, the platform may experience brief interruptions.
author: System Admin

title: New Feature: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
message: We're excited to announce the launch of our new Advanced Analytics Dashboard! Get deeper insights into your talent management operations with customizable reports and real-time metrics.
author: Product Team

title: Security Update Required
message: Important: Please update your password and enable two-factor authentication to enhance your account security. This is a mandatory security requirement.
author: Security Team

title: Payment Processing Improvements
message: We've upgraded our payment processing system to provide faster transactions and better reliability. You may notice improved checkout speeds.
author: Finance Team

title: New Compliance Requirements
message: Updated compliance requirements for talent agencies are now in effect. Please review the new guidelines in your admin dashboard.
author: Compliance Team

title: Mobile App Update Available
message: Version 2.5 of our mobile app is now available with improved performance and new features. Update now to get the latest improvements.
author: Mobile Team

title: Holiday Schedule Announcement
message: Our support team will have limited availability during the upcoming holiday period (March 1-3). Emergency support will still be available 24/7.
author: Support Team

title: API Rate Limit Changes
message: Starting March 1st, API rate limits will be adjusted to improve platform stability. Please review the updated limits in our developer documentation.
author: Engineering Team

title: New Training Resources Available
message: We've added comprehensive training materials and video tutorials to help you get the most out of the platform. Check out the new Learning Center.
author: Training Team

title: Billing Cycle Update
message: Your next billing cycle will begin on March 1st. Please ensure your payment information is up to date to avoid service interruptions.
author: Billing Team

title: System Performance Optimization
message: We've completed major performance optimizations that should result in 40% faster page load times across the platform.
author: Engineering Team

title: Data Export Feature Enhancement
message: The data export feature now supports additional file formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Export your data in the format that works best for you.
author: Product Team
